Why is this page here?

As a naive adoloscent and again as a sophomore, I was tricked into building websites for a bunch of people. One day, I realized that I could make one for myself and document the more interesting parts of my life; Hopefully, one day, do a Sergey Brin to the amusement of the lurkers in reddit.

*If you are a potential employer, please pardon the bad jokes and informal tone

About Me

I am from Chennai, India and love the city. Though the weather here leaves a lot to be desired, I do miss the sweltering heat and humidity whenever I go elsewhere.
